Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 23 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with a bathroom. Guests will also find a tea/coffee station included as standard. Little extras, including a telephone, a TV and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
